trigger: Our findings suggest that next to lymphocyte infiltration , active regulatory events in the thyrocyte are responsible for the inverse relation between functional parameters ( <extra_id_0> TSH-R <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> thyroid peroxidase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> thyroglobulin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , and <extra_id_0> c-fos <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) and immunological markers ( MHC I and II ) .

Our findings suggest that next to lymphocyte infiltration , active regulatory events in the thyrocyte are responsible for the inverse relation between functional parameters ( TSH-R , thyroid peroxidase , thyroglobulin , and c-fos ) and immunological markers ( MHC I and II ) .
